name: Bistri
description: Bistri reinvents the way we make video calls with a simple and permanent link to be reached.  It works from the Web, on the mobile Web, Android and iOS.  With Bistri APIs you can integrate Video Calling, Video Conferencing, and Data Channels right into your own applications.

apis.name: Bistri
